item.title: mudler /LocalAI | Go | 40,512
item.description: ğŸ¤– The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more. Features: Generate Text, MCP, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P and decentralized inference

item.title: justlovemaki /AIClient-2-API | JavaScript | 1,880
item.description: Simulates Gemini CLI, Antigravity, Qwen Code, and Kiro client requests, compatible with the OpenAI API. It supports thousands of Gemini model requests per day and offers free use of the built-in Claude model in Kiro. Easily connect to any client via the API, making AI development more efficient!
